title: TikTok puts hundreds of UK content moderator jobs at risk
summary: The firm says it's planning to relocate work to its other offices in Europe and invest more in AI.

title: James Wynn places high-stakes leveraged bets as ETH hits fresh highs
summary: James Wynn opens 25x ETH long and 10x DOGE long, totaling $345K in leveraged exposure. Ether surges to $4,867 with ETF inflows of $287.6M and growing corporate reserves. Wynn returns after $100M BTC loss, reigniting attention with risky high-leverage trades.
